projects.title: Data Visualization: Jet Impingement
projects.description: This is a part of my PhD project. The data comes from experiments of liquid jet impingement on a fast moving wall. I visualized the data to find the relationships between the operating conditions (jet speed, moving wall speed, nozzle size, liquid viscosity) and the shape of the lamella spread (heel length, downstream width, averaged downstream thickness).

projects.title: SwordRama - Sword Recommender & Reviews
projects.description: SwordRama is a review platform and a recommendation system to share information and get insights on HEMA (Historical European Martial Arts) swords. Users can browse, filter, search and comment on the swords. They will also get a personalized recommendation list based on machine learning algorithm.

projects.title: Bloggers - Blog App Powered by Django
projects.description: A full-featured blog web app built with Django. Users can create posts, update their profiles, and use email to reset their password. Files are manged on AWS S3.

projects.title: Handcrafty - Sell & Shop for Handmade Items
projects.description: Handcrafty is a full stack online handcrafts store with real credit card checkout. Users can search, sell, edit, add to cart and buy their favorite items.

projects.description: "Baizi" means "100 letters" in Chinese. This full stack minimalist journal app promps user to write a 100-letter journal everyday - not one letter more, not one letter less.
